5a1384608bf55085c847976b.description:
+70 Ability Power
+45 Magic Resist
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Grants a spell shield that blocks the next enemy ability. This shield refreshes after no damage is taken from enemy champions for 40 seconds.
5a1384608bf55085c847976b.name: Banshee's Veil

5a1384608bf55085c847976e.description:
+30 Armor

UNIQUE Passive: Blocks 12% of the damage from basic attacks.
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed
5a1384608bf55085c847976e.name: Ninja Tabi

5a1384608bf55085c847976c.description:
+45 Armor
+175% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Point Runner: Builds up to +20% Movement Speed over 2 seconds while near turrets, fallen turrets and Void Gates.
UNIQUE Passive - Favor: Enemy minions killed by your allies sometimes drop coins that give either 30 gold or 8% missing mana (minimum 15). Cannon minions always drop coins.
UNIQUE Active: Grants nearby allies +40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds (60 second cooldown).
QUEST: Earn 650 gold using.
REWARD: Favor is upgraded to Emperor's Favor and you receive an Elixir Of Skills.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

''Praise the sun.'' - Historian Shurelya, 22 September, 25 CLE
5a1384608bf55085c847976c.name: Talisman of Ascension

5a1384608bf55085c847976a.description:
+300 Health
+65 Magic Resist
+100% Base Health Regeneration
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Aura: Nearby enemy champions take 10% more magic damage.
5a1384608bf55085c847976a.name: Abyssal Scepter

5a13845f8bf55085c8479768.description:
+200 Health
+125% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Favor: Enemy minions killed by your allies sometimes drop coins that give either 30 gold or 8% missing mana (minimum 15). Cannon minions always drop coins.
UNIQUE Active - Warding: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 150 seconds. Holds up to 4 charges which refill upon visiting the shop
QUEST: Earn 650 gold using this item.
REWARD: Favor is upgraded to Emperor's Favor and you receive an Elixir Of Skill.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.
5a13845f8bf55085c8479768.name: Eye of the Oasis

5a13845f8bf55085c8479769.description:
+40 Attack Damage
+25% Attack Speed
+15% Life Steal

UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal 8% of the target's current Health in bonus physical damage (max 60 vs. monsters and minions) on hit. Life Steal applies to this damage.
UNIQUE Active: Deals 100 magic damage to target champion and steals 25% of their Movement Speed for 3 seconds (90 second cooldown).
5a13845f8bf55085c8479769.name: Blade of the Ruined King

5a1384608bf55085c847976d.description:
+50% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Favor: Enemy minions killed by your allies sometimes drop coins that give either 30 gold or 8% missing mana (minimum 15). Cannon minions always drop coins.
QUEST: Earn 650 gold using this item.
REWARD: Favor is upgraded to Emperor's Favor and you receive an Elixir Of Skill.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

''The medallion shines with the glory of a thousand voices when exposed to the sun.'' - Historian Shurelya, 22 June, 24 CLE
5a1384608bf55085c847976d.name: Nomad's Medallion

5a13860c8bf55085c847d394.tooltip:
Cripple an enemy, slowing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e8 }} second.

After Lamb attacks the target twice, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, dealing massive physical damage.

Wolf deals physical damage equal to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) +{{ e4 }}% of the target's maximum health. [Maximum {{ e0 }} vs. monsters]
5a13860c8bf55085c847d394.name: Mounting Dread
5a13860c8bf55085c847d394.description: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.

5a13860b8bf55085c847d386.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.
5a13860b8bf55085c847d386.tooltip:
Renekton swings his blade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) Health for each non-champion hit and {{ f2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) Health for each champion hit, up to {{ e4 }} Health.

He generates 2.5 Fury for each non-champion hit and 10 Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of 30 Fury.

50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ effect1amount*1.5 }} (+{{ a2 }}). Heal increased to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f4 }}) per non-champion and {{ e2 }} (+{{ f5 }}) per champion, up to {{ e4 }}. No longer generates Fury.
5a13860b8bf55085c847d386.name: Cull the Meek

5a1386088bf55085c847d378.description: Ahri releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
5a1386088bf55085c847d378.tooltip:
Releases three fox-fires that lock on to nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions) dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Enemies hit with multiple fox-fires take 30% damage from each additional fox-fire beyond the first, for a maximum of {{ f1 }} damage to a single enemy.
5a1386088bf55085c847d378.name: Fox-Fire

5a13860b8bf55085c847d385.description: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.
5a13860b8bf55085c847d385.tooltip:
First cast: Zac faces the cursor and charges up over {{ e4 }} seconds.

Second cast: Launches Zac towards a location, knocking up nearby enemies for {{ f2 }} to {{ f3 }} seconds (based on charge time) and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Zac spawns extra chunks of Goo for each enemy champion hit.

16
5a13860b8bf55085c847d385.name: Elastic Slingshot

5a13860a8bf55085c847d380.description:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Magic Damage and reveals enemies hit.
5a13860a8bf55085c847d380.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks within 5 seconds deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

Burrowed: Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that explodes on first enemy hit, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage and revealing non-stealthed enemies for {{ e6 }} seconds.
5a13860a8bf55085c847d380.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker

5a13860b8bf55085c847d38a.description: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.
5a13860b8bf55085c847d38a.tooltip:
Malphite slams the ground dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies, reducing their Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

This ability gains damage equal to {{ e3 }}% of Malphite's Armor.
5a13860b8bf55085c847d38a.name: Ground Slam

5a13860c8bf55085c847d390.description: A skillshot basic attack. After two successful Steel Tempests, the next fires a tornado that knocks enemies Airborne.
5a13860c8bf55085c847d390.tooltip:
Thrusts forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

On hit, Steel Tempest grants a stack of Gathering Storm for 10 seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne.

Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack: It can critically strike, applies on-hit effects, is interruptible by crowd control and its cooldown and cast time are reduced by Attack Speed.

If cast while dashing, Steel Tempest will strike as a circle.
5a13860c8bf55085c847d390.name: Steel Tempest

5a13860c8bf55085c847d38c.description: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.
5a13860c8bf55085c847d38c.tooltip: Malzahar opens two portals to the Void that fire projectiles inward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and silencing enemies hit for {{ e2 }} second(s).
5a13860c8bf55085c847d38c.name: Call of the Void

5a13860c8bf55085c847d38d.description: Malzahar summons a Voidling. The first time a summoned Voidling attacks a champion or monster, Malzahar summons a new Voidling.
5a13860c8bf55085c847d38d.tooltip:
Summon a Voidling lasting {{ e1 }} seconds to fight nearby enemies.

If a Voidling has more than {{ f3 }} seconds remaining, its first attack on a champion or monster spawns a new Voidling with the same remaining duration.

Voidlings:
  • Deal {{ f1 }} (+{{ f4 }}) physical damage plus {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage ({{ e7 }}% damage against monsters)
    If they are close to Malzahar, have {{ e0 }}% bonus Movement Speed towards enemies afflicted by Nether Grasp or Malefic Visions
    Deal {{ e6 }}% damage to lane minions affected by Malefic Visions
    Move slower the further they get from Malzahar
5a13860c8bf55085c847d38d.name: Void Swarm

5a1386088bf55085c847d37a.description: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging 3 nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions). Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown.
5a1386088bf55085c847d37a.tooltip: Nimbly dashes forward firing 3 essence bolts at nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions) dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Can be cast up to three times within 10 seconds before going on cooldown.
5a1386088bf55085c847d37a.name: Spirit Rush

5a13860b8bf55085c847d38b.description: Passive: Grants Kayle on Hit magic Damage.  Activate: Ignite Kayle's sword with a holy flame, granting Kayle a ranged attack that damages multiple enemies and deals bonus magic damage.
5a13860b8bf55085c847d38b.tooltip:
Passive: Kayle's Basic Attacks deal an additional {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage on hit.

Active: Kayle increases her Attack Range by 400 for 10 seconds and the passive bonus is increased to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and apply spell effects on hit.

In addition, enemies near her target take {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and apply spell effects on attack.
5a13860b8bf55085c847d38b.name: Righteous Fury

5a13860a8bf55085c847d37c.description:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next @Effect9Amount@ seconds.
Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For @Effect8Amount@ seconds, Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.
5a13860a8bf55085c847d37c.tooltip:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally. If the ally is a champion, Lee Sin shields the ally and himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e3 }} seconds and Safeguard's cooldown is reduced by {{ e6 }}%. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next {{ e9 }} seconds.

Iron Will: Lee Sin gains {{ e2 }}% Life Steal and Spell Vamp for {{ e8 }} seconds.
5a13860a8bf55085c847d37c.name: Safeguard / Iron Will

5a13860c8bf55085c847d38f.description: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.
5a13860c8bf55085c847d38f.tooltip: Malzahar suppresses a target champion for {{ e4 }} seconds and creates a zone of negative energy around it that deals {{ e1 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of nearby enemies max Health as magic damage per second for {{ e3 }} seconds.
5a13860c8bf55085c847d38f.name: Nether Grasp

5a13860a8bf55085c847d37d.description:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple for the next @Effect6Amount@ seconds.
Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Movement Speed for @Effect5Amount@ seconds. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.
5a13860a8bf55085c847d37d.tooltip:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast Cripple for the next {{ e6 }} seconds.

Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies struck by Tempest for {{ e5 }} seconds, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.
5a13860a8bf55085c847d37d.name: Tempest / Cripple

5a13860c8bf55085c847d38e.description:
Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions.

If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.
5a13860c8bf55085c847d38e.tooltip:
Deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to an enemy target over {{ e3 }} seconds. Applying Call of the Void or Nether Grasp to the victim during this time refreshes the visions.

If the victim is killed, Malzahar gains {{ f1 }} Mana ({{ e5 }}% of max mana) and the visions spread to the nearest enemy.
5a13860c8bf55085c847d38e.name: Malefic Visions

5a13860a8bf55085c847d37e.description: Sion shields himself and can reactivate after 3 seconds to deal Magic Damage to enemies nearby. When Sion kills enemies, he passively gains maximum Health.
5a13860a8bf55085c847d37e.tooltip:
Passive: Sion gains {{ e5 }} maximum Health when he kills a unit ({{ e6 }} for large monsters and champion kills or assists). Current Bonus: {{ f1 }}

Active: Sion shields himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) ({{ e3 }}% of maximum Health) for 6 seconds. After {{ e7 }} seconds, while the shield holds, Sion can reactivate to deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e4 }}% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage to nearby enemies. Max 400 bonus damage to minions and monsters.
5a13860a8bf55085c847d37e.name: Soul Furnace

5a13860b8bf55085c847d387.description: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.
5a13860b8bf55085c847d387.tooltip:
Renekton's next attack strikes twice, stunning his target for {{ e3 }} seconds and dealing {{ effect5amount*0.5 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage per hit ({{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }}) total).

Each strike applies on-hit effects and generates Fury. Hitting a champion generates an additional {{ e7 }} Fury.

50 Fury Bonus: Renekton attacks three times, stunning his target for {{ e4 }} seconds and dealing a total of {{ effect5amount*1.5 }} (+{{ f3 }}) damage. No longer generates Fury.
5a13860b8bf55085c847d387.name: Ruthless Predator

5a13860c8bf55085c847d393.tooltip:
Wolf claims a territory, attacking nearby enemies inside it for {{ e4 }} seconds. Lamb can direct him to targets by attacking them. If Lamb leaves Wolf's territory he will cease attacking and join her.

Wolf's attacks deal physical damage equal to {{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of the damage from Mark of the Kindred

Wolf maims monsters, dealing {{ e7 }}% increased damage to them and reducing their attack and movement speed by {{ e8 }}% for 2 seconds.
5a13860c8bf55085c847d393.name: Wolf's Frenzy
5a13860c8bf55085c847d393.description: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.

5a13860b8bf55085c847d384.description: Zac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.
5a13860b8bf55085c847d384.tooltip:
Zac's arm stretches and grabs the first enemy it hits, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage and briefly slowing them. Zac's next basic attack is replaced with a long range smack that repeats the initial magic damage and slow effect.

If Zac grabs a different enemy with each attack he'll throw them towards each other, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage in an area if they collide.
5a13860b8bf55085c847d384.name: Stretching Strikes

5a13860b8bf55085c847d389.description: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.
5a13860b8bf55085c847d389.tooltip: Renekton surrounds himself with dark energies for {{ e5 }} seconds, gaining {{ e1 }} Health and {{ e6 }} Fury. While active, he deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and gains {{ e4 }} Fury per second.
5a13860b8bf55085c847d389.name: Dominus

5a13860a8bf55085c847d381.description:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
5a13860a8bf55085c847d381.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Burrow into the ground.

Burrowed: Un-burrow, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage and knocking up nearby enemies for up to 1 second based on their proximity to Rek'Sai. A unit cannot be hit by Un-burrow more than once every {{ e6 }} seconds.

Burrowed Effects: New abilities, +{{ f1 }} Movement Speed, reduced vision range, disabled basic attacks, and gains Tremor Sense: Nearby enemies that move in Fog of War have their position revealed to Rek'Sai and her allies.
5a13860a8bf55085c847d381.name: Burrow / Un-burrow

5a13860c8bf55085c847d391.description: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.
5a13860c8bf55085c847d391.tooltip:
Maokai flings a sapling, which stands watch for {{ f1 }} seconds. Saplings will chase nearby enemies, detonating on proximity, dealing {{ e1 }} +{{ e8 }}% [+{{ a1 }}%] Target Max Health magic damage and slowing enemies struck by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Saplings placed in brush last for {{ e9 }} seconds and cause a larger explosion, dealing double damage over {{ e6 }} seconds to all enemies hit.

Maximum {{ e4 }} Damage to non-Champions, doubled for brush.
5a13860c8bf55085c847d391.name: Sapling Toss

5a13860a8bf55085c847d382.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai bites a target dealing {{ f1 }} Physical Damage, increasing by up to 100% at maximum Fury. Deals True Damage if Rek'Sai has 100 Fury.

Maximum Damage: {{ f2 }}

Burrowed: Rek'Sai tunnels forward leaving two connected Tunnel Entrances. Clicking a Tunnel Entrance will make Rek'Sai dive to the other entrance.

Tunnel Entrances last for {{ e5 }} minutes and can be destroyed by enemies. Rek'Sai may have {{ e6 }} tunnels at one time. Tunnels have a {{ e8 }} second cooldown on use.
5a13860a8bf55085c847d382.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
5a13860a8bf55085c847d382.description:
Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing increased damage based on her Fury. Deals True Damage at max Fury.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.

5a13860a8bf55085c847d37f.tooltip: Toggle: Dr. Mundo deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ charabilitypower*2 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies per second, and reduces the duration of disables on Dr. Mundo by {{ e2 }}%.
5a13860a8bf55085c847d37f.name: Burning Agony
5a13860a8bf55085c847d37f.description: Dr. Mundo drains his Health to reduce the duration of disables and deal continual damage to nearby enemies.

5a1386088bf55085c847d379.description: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, causing them to walk harmlessly towards her.
5a1386088bf55085c847d379.tooltip: Blows a kiss dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and charms an enemy causing them to walk harmlessly towards Ahri for {{ e2 }} second(s).
5a1386088bf55085c847d379.name: Charm

5a13860a8bf55085c847d383.tooltip:
Passive: Grants {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: After channeling for 1.5 seconds, Rek'Sai becomes untargetable and travels to target Tunnel Entrance. Taking damage from a champion or tower will interrupt the channel.
5a13860a8bf55085c847d383.name: Void Rush
5a13860a8bf55085c847d383.description: Rek'Sai travels at incredible speed to a targeted Tunnel Entrance.

5a13860b8bf55085c847d388.description: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.
5a13860b8bf55085c847d388.tooltip:
Slice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies he passes through. Hitting an enemy grants the ability to use Dice for {{ e8 }} seconds.

Dice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies he passes through.

He generates {{ e2 }} Fury for each non-champion hit and {{ e5 }} Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of 30 Fury.

Dice - 50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ effect1amount*1.5 }} (+{{ f2 }}). Enemies hit have {{ e3 }}% reduced Armor for {{ e4 }} seconds. No longer generates Fury.
5a13860b8bf55085c847d388.name: Slice and Dice

5a13860a8bf55085c847d37b.description:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next @Effect7Amount@ seconds.
Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage plus @Effect4Amount*100@% of their missing Health.
5a13860a8bf55085c847d37b.tooltip:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy it encounters, granting True Sight of the target. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next {{ e7 }} seconds.

Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage plus {{ e3 }}% of their missing Health (Max: {{ e6 }} Damage vs. Monsters).
5a13860a8bf55085c847d37b.name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike

5a13860c8bf55085c847d392.tooltip:
Lamb vaults, firing up to 3 arrows at nearby enemies, dealing {{ f2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Casting Wolf's Frenzy or vaulting inside of its effect reduces the cooldown of this spell to {{ e4 }} seconds.
5a13860c8bf55085c847d392.name: Dance of Arrows
5a13860c8bf55085c847d392.description: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.

5a13876e8bf55085c847fd21.description: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic attacks and Dance of Arrows.
5a13876e8bf55085c847fd21.name: Mark of the Kindred
